mapper.select:
select
from hty_fct_org_income where ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} order by YEAR_MON desc limit 1

select
from hty_fct_org_income where YEAR_MON like CONCAT(#{yearMon},'%') and ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} order by YEAR_MON ASC

select u.rowNo from ( select t.ORG_CODE,t.YEAR_BUSINCOME_AMT,t.YEAR_MON,(@rowNum:=@rowNum+1) as rowNo from ( select ORG_CODE,YEAR_BUSINCOME_AMT,YEAR_MON from hty_fct_org_income where YEAR_MON = #{yearMon} and ORG_CODE in (SELECT c.ORG_CODE from DCI_DIM_ORG c where c.ORG_PCODE = (SELECT d.ORG_PCODE from DCI_DIM_ORG d where d.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode})) order by hty_fct_org_income.YEAR_BUSINCOME_AMT desc ) t,(select (@rowNum :=0) ) b ) u where u.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}
SELECT cast(avg(YEAR_BUSINCOME_AMT) as decimal(20,2)) as avgNum FROM hty_fct_org_income where YEAR_MON=#{yearMon}
SELECT org.ORG_SNAME FROM hty_fct_org_income sale,DCI_DIM_ORG org where sale.YEAR_MON=#{yearMon} and org.ORG_CODE=sale.ORG_CODE ORDER BY sale.YEAR_BUSINCOME_AMT DESC LIMIT 0,10

SELECT org.ORG_SNAME FROM hty_fct_org_income sale,DCI_DIM_ORG org where sale.YEAR_MON=#{yearMon} and org.ORG_CODE=sale.ORG_CODE and sale.ORG_CODE in (SELECT c.ORG_CODE from DCI_DIM_ORG c where c.ORG_PCODE = (SELECT d.ORG_PCODE from DCI_DIM_ORG d where d.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode})) ORDER BY sale.YEAR_BUSINCOME_AMT DESC LIMIT 0,10
